pageProduct.name: Sambucol Kids Immunity 120 Gummies
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Great tasting gummies to help support children's healthy immune function.

Sambucol Kids Gummies are a great way to support your child's healthy immune system function, whether at rest, play or in the classroom. Sambucol Kids Gummies provide a convenient supporting daily dose of Black Elderberry, Vitamin C, Zinc and Honey to help support:
- Healthy immune system function
- General health and wellbeing

Size: 120 Pack

Warnings

No artificial colours. Vitamins can only be of assistance if the dietary vitamin intake is inadequate. Not to be given to children under 2 years.

Contains sugar and gluten derived from wheat. Contains sulfites, soya beans.

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.

Ingredients

Each Pastille (Gummy) contains:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderberry)
fruit juice powder 15.8mg
equivalent to fresh juice 500mg
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 25mg
Honey 50mg
Zinc (as zinc citrate dihydrate) 1.5mg

Directions

To help support healthy immune function in children:
Children 2 - 4: take 1 - 3 gummies per day with food.
Children 4+ yrs: take 2 - 5 gummies per day with food.
